Title: MetroGA
Description:
This component allows you to implement Google Analytics on your WinRT apps.
It is based on Google Analytics Mobile Apps to enable better reports.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This component allows you to implement Google Analytics on your WinRT apps.
It is based on Google Analytics Mobile Apps to enable better reports.

The binaries are already available on NuGet: http://nuget.org/packages/MetroGA
Source code will follow soon...
